hints: Divock Origi scored twice.
Man of the match: Trent Alexander-Arnold.
Liverpool overturned a 3-0 first-leg deficit.
Toni Kroos scored twice.
Man of the match: Toni Kroos.
Brazil suffered their heaviest World Cup defeat.
Teddy Sheringham and Ole Gunnar Solskjær scored in injury time.
Man of the match: David Beckham.
United completed the treble with this win.
Antoine Griezmann scored and assisted.
Man of the match: Antoine Griezmann.
France won their second World Cup.
Didier Drogba scored the equalizer.
Man of the match: Didier Drogba.
Chelsea won on penalties.
Andrés Iniesta scored the winning goal.
Man of the match: Andrés Iniesta.
Spain won their first World Cup.
Sergio Ramos scored a stoppage-time equalizer.
Man of the match: Ángel Di María.
Real Madrid won their 10th European Cup.
Ronaldo scored both goals.
Man of the match: Ronaldo.
Brazil won their fifth World Cup.
Lionel Messi and Kylian Mbappé both scored.
Man of the match: Lionel Messi.
Argentina won on penalties.
Leonardo Bonucci scored for Italy.
Man of the match: Leonardo Bonucci.
Italy won on penalties.
